MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW9 postcode area of Northwich, affecting properties in Middlewich Road, Woodier Close and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:20PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.58AM on 13th October 2020.
